actor_awards.notes: A diminutive character actor with a distinctive high-pitched voice, often cast as henpecked husbands or timid, befuddled authority figures. He was a veteran of the stage before becoming a reliable supporting player in Hollywood's Golden Age.

filmography.title: His Girl Friday
filmography.role_description: A poetic and somewhat effeminate reporter who writes human interest stories and is fiercely protective of his desk.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

filmography.title: Bachelor Mother
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, befuddled owner of a department store who mistakenly believes he has become a grandfather.
filmography.plot: A single woman discovers a baby on the steps of an orphanage and is mistaken for the mother, leading to complications with her boss's son.

filmography.title: Christmas in July
filmography.role_description: The president of a coffee company who is central to a misunderstanding regarding a slogan contest.
filmography.plot: A man mistakenly thinks he has won a large cash prize in a slogan contest and goes on a spending spree.

filmography.title: Nothing Sacred
filmography.role_description: A small-town Vermont resident who is skeptical of the big-city reporters invading his town.
filmography.plot: A reporter tries to redeem his reputation by exploiting the story of a Vermont woman who thinks she is dying of radium poisoning.

filmography.title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
filmography.role_description: The Sunday School superintendent who is easily flustered by the antics of Tom and the other boys.
filmography.plot: Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn witness a murder and have various adventures in their Mississippi River town.

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful World
filmography.role_description: A wealthy client of a private detective who gets framed for murder, sparking a cross-country chase.
filmography.plot: A private detective kidnaps a poetess and takes her on a chase to find the real killer of his client's aunt.

filmography.title: Dance, Girl, Dance
filmography.role_description: One of two talent scouts who discover the contrasting dance acts of Bubbles and Judy.
filmography.plot: A ballet dancer and a burlesque queen compete for the same man while struggling to achieve their dreams.

filmography.title: The Moon Is Down
filmography.role_description: A storekeeper and historian in a Norwegian town occupied by Nazis who aids the resistance.
filmography.plot: When the Nazis invade a small Norwegian town, the people are stirred to rebellion by the mayor.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: This Is the Army
filmography.role_description: The father of the female lead, involved in the home front efforts during the war.
filmography.plot: A musical revue featuring soldiers during World War II, based on the Irving Berlin Broadway show.

filmography.title: Whistling in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A mystery writer who is kidnapped by a gang and forced to design a perfect murder. Truex originated this role on Broadway.
filmography.plot: A crime novelist is forced by a gang to devise a way to kill a man without leaving a trace.

filmography.title: The Warrior's Husband
filmography.role_description: The effeminate husband of an Amazon warrior queen in this role-reversal comedy.
filmography.plot: In a kingdom ruled by women, the men are stay-at-home husbands until the Greeks arrive.

filmography.title: Lillian Russell
filmography.role_description: The father of the famous singer and actress Lillian Russell.
filmography.plot: A biography of the American stage star Lillian Russell, from her early days to her rise to fame.

filmography.title: Twilight for the Gods
filmography.role_description: A passenger on a crumbling sailing ship, bringing a sense of morality to the desperate voyage.
filmography.plot: A washed-up captain takes a leaking ship and a group of desperate passengers from Tahiti to Mexico.

filmography.title: Hired Wife
filmography.role_description: A comedic supporting role in this Rosalind Russell screwball comedy.
filmography.plot: A secretary agrees to marry her boss for business reasons, but tries to make the marriage real.

filmography.title: Fluffy
filmography.role_description: A hotel manager dealing with the chaos of a pet lion.
filmography.plot: A scientist tries to prove that a lion can be trained as a harmless pet.

filmography.title: Always in My Heart
filmography.role_description: A quirky character who befriends a convict returning to his family.
filmography.plot: A musician wrongly convicted of murder returns home to find his wife about to remarry.

filmography.title: Star Spangled Rhythm
filmography.role_description: Appears as himself in a sketch in this all-star Paramount wartime revue.
filmography.plot: A Paramount gatekeeper pretends to be the studio boss to impress his son and his son's friends.

filmography.title: Life with Blondie
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman who hires Daisy the dog as a model, causing trouble for the Bumstead family.
filmography.plot: The Bumstead family dog, Daisy, becomes a pin-up model and the family has to deal with her newfound fame.

filmography.title: Men in Her Diary
filmography.role_description: A jealous husband involved in a misunderstanding caused by a diary.
filmography.plot: A plain secretary keeps a diary of imaginary romances which falls into the hands of a jealous wife.

filmography.title: True to the Army
filmography.role_description: A character in this musical comedy about a tightrope walker hiding in an army camp.
filmography.plot: A circus performer hides from gangsters by disguising herself as a soldier.

filmography.title: Private Buckaroo
filmography.role_description: The commanding officer in this musical featuring the Andrews Sisters.
filmography.plot: A band leader is drafted into the army and tries to put on a show with his fellow soldiers.

filmography.title: The Crystal Ball
filmography.role_description: A client of a fake fortune teller in this romantic comedy.
filmography.plot: A woman takes a job with a fortune teller and uses her position to help a lawyer win a government contract.

filmography.title: Her Primitive Man
filmography.role_description: The uncle of the anthropologist protagonist.
filmography.plot: An author of a book on headhunters poses as a savage to prove an anthropologist wrong.

filmography.title: Pan-Americana
filmography.role_description: A character in this musical romance set against a tour of Latin America.
filmography.plot: magazine photographers travel to Latin America to find the prettiest girl.

filmography.title: The Girl from Jones Beach
filmography.role_description: A judge in this comedy about an artist looking for the perfect model.
filmography.plot: An artist searches for a model who embodies the perfect combination of features he calls 'The Randolph Girl'.

filmography.title: Start Cheering
filmography.role_description: The henpecked sidekick to Jimmy Durante's character.
filmography.plot: A famous movie star quits Hollywood to go to college, much to the dismay of his manager.

filmography.title: Freshman Year
filmography.role_description: A college professor in this musical comedy.
filmography.plot: Three students try to put on a show to save their college from financial ruin.

filmography.title: Ambush
filmography.role_description: A bank secretary forced to help bank robbers.
filmography.plot: A gang of bank robbers forces a truck driver and a secretary to help them escape.
